415550.name: Fantasy Grounds - Call of Cthulhu: Fatal Experiments
415550.description:
Fatal Experiments is a collection of three independent 1920's adventures for the Call of Cthulhu roleplaying game. Two of the three scenarios are suitable for both beginning and experienced players, making this book a perfect companion for first-time buyers of the Call of Cthulhu game system. The remaining adventure is unusually dangerous -- to be played only by experienced, foolhardy investigators.
Author(s): Richard Watts, Penelope Love, Kurt Miller, Russell Bullman, Gregory W. Detwiler, Kevin A. Ross, L.N. Isynwill, William Dunn
Requires: Call of Cthulhu ruleset
Converted by: Colin Richardson
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Call of Cthulhu ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
